title: New: Wolvs â€“ Stumble
content:
Announcing himself with his rather fantastic debut track Pieces, French dark-pop maestro Wolvs has dropped his second offering, the seductively simple Stumble.

The structure may be desirably straight forward, but the sound itself is telling hard to pin down, neither giving in to the pop tendencies, nor distancing itself entirely from synth drive pop hits. Check out Stumble below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
